Class GravityHandler

java.lang.Object
logic.GravityHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoardHandler
public class GravityHandler extends Object
Handles any board/pieces interactions to do with gravity It makes sure all pieces are at the bottommost positions and has checks for if a column is filled (from gravity)

  • Method Details

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(int[][] board, int column)
      inspects a column in a board and sees if there is a valid move
      Parameters:
      board - the board being inspected
      column - the column to check if there is a valid move
      Returns:
      true if the topmost slot in the column is unoccupied

    • addPiece

      public int[][] addPiece(int[][] board, int column, int player)
      Creates a deep copy of a board passed in and adds a disc in the lowest position in a specified column.
      Parameters:
      board - the board to add a disc to
      column - The specified column to add a disc to
      player - the int indicator for which player to add a disc for
      Returns:
      a new 2D array, without a pointer to the previous one so that the parameter variable is not modified.

    • findLowest

      public int findLowest(int[][] board, int column)
      Finds the index of the lowest available slot in a given column for a given board
      Parameters:
      board - the board to inspect
      column - the column of the board to inspect
      Returns:
      the int index of the lowest spot
